Nullify_Pain.help: Nullify Pain will heal nearby allies for some hit points by numbing the pain caused by their wounds. Nullify Pain is not as potent as Soothe, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You nullify some of {PlayerDest}'s pain and heal them for {Damage} points of health.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} nullifies some of your pain to heal you for {Damage} points of health.

Soothe.help: You heal an ally by numbing their pain and calming their mind. You cannot use this power on yourself.

Enforced_Morale.help: Enforced Morale frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, Enforced Morale grants the target clearer Perception to see hidden foes, and a minor recharge and movement speed boost. The Protection and Movement boosts will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level, although the Recharge and Movement boosts will only apply for the first few applications. If the ally is not damaged, Enforced Morale will cause them some pain before granting its benefits. Recharge: Fast
Enforced_Morale.shortHelp: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception, +Recharge, +Speed, Minor Damage
Enforced_Morale.targetHelp: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
Enforced_Morale.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Enforced_Morale.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Soothing_Aura.help: While this power is active all nearby allies will be healed by Soothing Aura every couple of seconds for a small portion of their health. (NOTE: While on PvP maps this power will grant affected targets a regeneration effect instead of a periodic heal.)
Soothing_Aura.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Minor Periodic Heal
Soothing_Aura.targetHelp: You are standing within a Soothing Aura, you will periodically recovery health.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of health with their {PowerName}!

World_of_Pain.help: When this power is activated the user and all nearby team members will gain a moderate damage, resistance, and to-hit bonus. Additionally those affected by this power will also be protected from Placate effects.
World_of_Pain.targetHelp: Your chance to hit, damage resistance, damage output is increased. Additionally your resistance to Placate is increased.
World_of_Pain.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output.
World_of_Pain.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output with their {PowerName}!

Anguishing_Cry.help: You let out an Anguishing Cry causing a great deal of pain in your foes reducing their resistance and defense to damage for a short time.
Anguishing_Cry.targetHelp: Your resistance and defense has been reduced by the Anguishing Cry.
Anguishing_Cry.attackerHit: You let out an {PowerName} reducing the defense and resistance of {PlayerDest}!
Anguishing_Cry.victimHit: The harsh sound of {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} rings in your ears reducing your resistance and defense!

Painbringer.help: You transform an ally to pain incarnate turning them into an inexhaustible killing machine. While the character is imbued with this power they will benefit from incredible health regeneration, endurance recovery and improved damage potential for a short time.
Painbringer.targetHelp: You have been inspired to inflict a great deal of pain. Your regeneration, recovery and damage have been greatly increased!
Painbringer.attackerHit: You empower {PlayerDest} with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and damage output
Painbringer.victimHit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and damage output.
